creditLine: Purchased as part of the Oppé Collection with assistance from the National Lottery through the Heritage Lottery Fund 1996
groupTitle: A New Method for Assisting the Invention in the Composition of Landscape
title: 1. Part of the Edge or Top of a Hill or Mountain, Seen Horizontally, the Horizon below the Bottom of the View. The Horizon is the Utmost Bounds of the Land of a Flat Country, or the Sea, in an Uninterrupted View of It to the Sky
